name: Necro Party Organizer - Sensei Game Jam 2017
name_original: Necro Party Organizer - Sensei Game Jam 2017
description:
Today is Day of the Dead, Día de Muertos - the biggest undead fete during year.
Wake up the dead and bring them to the party. But watch out for nuns, as they want to kill your party and take celebration just for themselves!
